patthana8.51:1.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.51:2.1: Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho ca naasaṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.51:3.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhañca naasaṃkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.51:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
